Package CarAndMap

Class TrackCAM

java.lang.Object
CarAndMap.TrackCAM
public class TrackCAM
extends java.lang.Object
Draws 2 different tracks, track boundaries, and obstacles.

    • drawObstacle

      public void drawObstacle​(java.awt.Graphics g, java.awt.image.BufferedImage im, double x, double y, double w, double h)
      Create and draw obstacle from image param including outer bounds for collision detection.
      Parameters:
      g - - graphics interface
      im - - buffered image
      x - - x-axis image position
      y - - y-axis image position
      w - - width of image to create shape
      h - - height of image to create shape
